artist: Text by Matsukawa Hanzan; Published by Okada Mohei
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; printed white label on front cover; text and images; images of children walking through a gate, ships, lighthouse, man in Western clothing with two people in Asian clothing and a dog, different types of Western clothing, solider with a cannon, Western lamp and writing implements, Western tools and tableware, and animals of various sorts including a kangaroo and an ostrich
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
text: Created to educate children by describing Western objects and events for children.
title: Coming and Going for Modernized Children, part 1
